sentences.cn: 国际通用预付回信邮资券

sentences.en: Attach the coupon to the front of your letter.
sentences.cn: 把优惠券附在信的正面。

sentences.en: Bring the coupon below to any Tecno store and pay just £10.99.
sentences.cn: 持下面的优惠券到任意一家Tecno专卖店，只需付10.99英镑。

sentences.en: Circle the correct answers on the coupon below.
sentences.cn: 将下面参赛券上的正确答案圈出来。

sentences.en: Cut out the coupon and send those cheques off today.
sentences.cn: 剪下优惠券，并于今天把支票寄出去。

sentences.en: Detach the coupon and return it as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 将赠券撕下后尽快寄回。

sentences.en: Fill in the coupon and send it first class to the address shown.
sentences.cn: 填写订单，并按一类邮件寄至注明的地址。

sentences.en: If you would like to send a donation to Cobuild, please enclose a cheque with your coupon.
sentences.cn: 如果你想为Cobuild语料库捐款，请随订货单附上支票。

sentences.en: Send the coupon with a cheque for £18.50, made payable to "Good Housekeeping"
sentences.cn: 将订单连同一张18.50英镑的支票一同寄出，支票抬头为“《好管家》杂志”。

sentences.en: Send the coupon with your deposit to House Beautiful Weekend, FAO Heidi Ross.
sentences.cn: 将订单和订金一同寄往《美宅周末》，海迪·罗斯收。
填写下面的订货单即可。

sentences.en: Tear off this coupon and use it to get 25 p off your next jar of coffee.
sentences.cn: 撕下这张优惠券,用它再买一瓶咖啡可省25便士.

sentences.en: The coupon entitles you to ten cents off your next purchase.
sentences.cn: 这张优惠券可以让你在下次购物时节省10分钱。

sentences.en: The coupon is not valid if detached.
To book your place fill in the coupon on page 187 and return it by 1st October.
sentences.cn: 如需预订名额，请填写187页上的订单，并于10月1号前寄回。

sentences.en: To enter, simply complete the coupon on page 150.
sentences.cn: 要想参加，只需填写第150页的参赛表格。

words.tran_cn: [金融]息票；[贸易]赠券；联票；[经]配给券

trans.tran_cn: 优惠券，票证，订货单，参赛表
trans.tran_en: a small piece of printed paper that gives you the right to pay less for something or get something free
